text: Assassin for Hire is a 1951 British crime movie directed by first time director Michael McCarthy and starring Sydney Tafler, Ronald Howard, Katharine Blake, John Hewer, Gerald Case, Sam Kydd, Martin Benson, Ewen Solon and Ivor Danvers. It was distributed by Anglo-Amalgamated Film Distributors. ==Other websites== * *Assassin for Hire at BFI Category:1951 crime movies Category:British crime movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Michael McCarthy
title: Assassin for Hire
